shortdesc.i: This event is fired by the system. If you want to listen to the event you can do so using the document.addEventListener function and remove the listener using the document.removeEventListener function. The pause event is triggered whenever the application is put into the background.

dd.p: The callback function that will be invoked on the pause event.

p.pre:
<script type="text/javascript">

function onPause() {
    alert("The app is about to be paused.");
}

document.addEventListener("pause", onPause);

</script>
